lead_paragraph: At the moment when they were set to take the field as foes, two soccer teams a continent apart raised their voices in unison on Wednesday, paying tribute to the 71 lives lost in a plane crash that canceled the final of the Copa Sudamericana.

headline.print_headline: Colombia and Brazil Soccer Teams Join in Tribute After Plane Crash
headline.main: Colombia and Brazil Soccer Teams Join in Tribute After Plane Crash

snippet: At the moment when they were set to take the field as foes, two soccer teams a continent apart raised their voices in unison on Wednesday, paying tribute to the 71 lives lost in a plane crash that canceled the final of the Copa Sudamericana....
